Search Liquor Prices

Take the hassle out of finding the best liquor prices across NZ!

How you can save

We monitor 1000’s of liquor deals every week to bring you the best advertised prices and hottest liquor deals.

What we monitor

Websites

Some good benefit about this feature.

Established in 2003, LIPS is a FREE search engine for alcohol prices. We monitor 1000’s of liquor deals every week, so you can find and compare prices on beer, wine, spirits, cider and RTD brands across New Zealand.

We have been providing suppliers and retailers with liquor pricing and promotion information for over 10 years. Now it’s your turn! We’ve entered more than 2 million prices, and over 15,000 liquor products since we started, so we’re pretty sure you’ll find a bargain or two. Try us out! It’s FREE and you just might get the best liquor deal in town, if not the country.

Plus, check out the LIPSale Monthly deals. Here we bring you 4 drinks deals, for 4 weeks only, direct from the merchant, at the very best prices!

Search, Compare, Save!

Jim Beam

“LIPS provide accurate, up to date liquor information beneficial to our everyday business.”

Bruce Priddy - Brand Manager
Hancocks Wine and Spirit Merchants

“LIPS pricing data has been a great innovation. It allows us to measure our share of 'advertising voice' and accurately assess where market prices are trending across a spectrum of channels not covered by other established monitoring services.”

Michael Dance – Marketing Manager

“ NZ’s only price spy to find the best advertised liquor deals ”

Search & compare advertised liquor prices from leading retailers nationwide.

We monitor 1000’s of beer, wine and spirits specials every week so you are guaranteed to find the best deal for you!
